## DisplayContainer.get() method

Get a child added with `addRange()`<!-- -->, by name and index.

**Signature:**

```typescript
get(name: string, index: number): IDisplayChild;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | Name used when adding an array of children. |
|  index | number | Index into the array of children. |

**Returns:**

[IDisplayChild](./bge-core.idisplaychild.md)
